title: Grant of Government Land : Any Government land falling under Integrated IT Township area shall be leased out to the developer at the prevailing market rate on usual terms conditions, without any subsidy
clause_text: Grant of Government Land : Any Government land falling under Integrated IT Township area shall be leased out to the developer at the prevailing market rate on usual terms conditions, without any subsidy.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
